title: Christmas with the Knightlys
overview: Following a breakup, schoolteacher Georgia Jackson finds herself in a fake relationship with wealthy playboy Chase Knight a week before Christmas. As they spend time together to outwit the paparazzi, Chase seems to find Georgiaâ€™s simpler life and traditions more appealing than his bachelor ways. Is it all a romantic ruse, or are Chase and Georgia really falling in love?
